text: The 2014–15 Campeonato Nacional season was the 84th season of top-flight football in Chile. Colo-Colo was the defending champion. ==Format changes== Same as last season: Apertura and Clausura format, without playoffs. ==Teams== ===Stadia and locations=== {| class="wikitable sortable" !
